[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”30201″ parallax_speed_bg=”2″ css=”.vc_custom_1742908443420{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}” el_class=”custom-banner-image”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1690444903430{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Private Safaris In Uganda & Rwanda.” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:50|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic” el_class=”custom-opacity-text” css=”.vc_custom_1742908829957{padding-top: 100px !important;}”][vc_separator color=”custom” align=”align_left” el_width=”20″ accent_color=”#f8f8f8″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1683905236614{border-top-width: 10px !important;border-right-width: 10px !important;border-left-width: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_headings style=”theme3″ linewidth=”100″ borderwidth=”3″ borderclr=”#890000″ title=”Uganda Safari Tours.” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic” titleclr=”#890000″][/vc_headings][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]Uganda safaris offer a unique opportunity to witness the diverse wildlife, stunning landscapes, and vibrant culture that make this country a top destination for nature enthusiasts. Whether exploring the enchanting Bwindi Impenetrable Forest in search of mountain gorillas or cruising along the mighty Nile River to spot hippos and crocodiles, Uganda offers various safari experiences that will leave you amazed.

From thrilling gorilla safaris in the dense forests of Bwindi Impenetrable National Park to exploring the magnificent landscapes of Murchison Falls and Queen Elizabeth National Parks, Uganda safaris deliver unforgettable excitement. With experienced tour companies in Uganda, you can choose from various safari packages and itineraries that cater to your preferences, ensuring an unforgettable journey filled with thrilling gorilla trekking, captivating wildlife encounters, and the opportunity to witness the rich diversity of this stunning country.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]You will experience the ultimate Uganda safari holidays as you embark on a once-in-a-lifetime adventure that will leave an indelible mark on your soul. Traverse the lush jungles and embark on gorilla tours, where you’ll face these majestic creatures in their natural habitat. Let expert Uganda tour operators guide you through the country’s hidden treasures, taking you on a mesmerizing journey that showcases the best of Uganda’s wildlife and landscapes.

Indulge in the thrill of spotting the Big Five in their natural habitat, witness the mighty Nile River cascading through Murchison Falls, and immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of the local communities. With carefully curated Uganda safari and tour packages, you can have a seamless travel experience combining adventure, comfort, and authentic encounters, making your visit to Uganda extraordinary.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column parallax=”content-moving” parallax_image=”11715″ width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”320px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_headings style=”theme3″ linewidth=”100″ borderwidth=”3″ borderclr=”#890000″ title=”UGANDA PACKAGES” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” titleclr=”#890000″][/vc_headings][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Gorilla Trekking” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23890000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Fuganda-safari%2F3-day-gorilla-trekking%2F”][vc_column_text]

Prepare for an awe-inspiring experience as you embark on gorilla trekking in the dense forests of Bwindi Impenetrable National Park. Trek through lush vegetation, guided by experienced tour guides, and witness the remarkable mountain gorillas in their natural habitat. This encounter with these gentle giants is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity that will leave you with a profound appreciation for their conservation.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Package” style=”custom” custom_background=”#890000″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-angle-double-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Fuganda-safari%2F3-day-gorilla-trekking%2F” css=”.vc_custom_1683959139729{background-color: #890000 !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”7471″ img_size=”600×300″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner rtl_reverse=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”30223″ img_size=”600×300″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Primate Tracking Safari” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23890000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]
Venture into Uganda’s lush forests on a primate tracking safari. Track chimpanzees in Kibale Forest National Park or trek through the misty jungles of Budongo Forest Reserve in search of the elusive and endangered chimpanzees. Along the way, you may encounter other primates, such as colobus monkeys, red-tailed monkeys, and baboons, providing a fascinating insight into their natural behaviors and habitats.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Package” style=”custom” custom_background=”#890000″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-angle-double-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Fuganda-safari%2F4-days-primate-tracking-safari%2F” css=”.vc_custom_1741356145423{background-color: #890000 !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner rtl_reverse=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Whispers of the Wind” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23890000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Fuganda-safari%2F6-days-whispers-of-the-wind%2F”][vc_column_text]
Embark on an unforgettable Uganda safari. This six-day itinerary takes you on a wildlife and cultural adventure in Uganda and Rwanda. Starting in Kampala, you’ll enjoy the scenic beauty of Lake Victoria before heading to Lake Mburo National Park, known for its diverse bird species and wildlife. Game drives and a boat cruise offer opportunities to spot zebras, giraffes, elephants, and various bird species. The journey continues to Bwindi Impenetrable National Park, where you’ll embark on a thrilling gorilla trekking experience. The trip concludes in Kigali, Rwanda, with a city tour and a visit to the Genocide Memorial Site before departing for home.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Package” style=”custom” custom_background=”#890000″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-angle-double-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Fuganda-safari%2F6-days-whispers-of-the-wind%2F” css=”.vc_custom_1683959463380{background-color: #890000 !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”30217″ img_size=”600×300″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner rtl_reverse=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”30229″ img_size=”600×300″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Nature’s Wonder Safari” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23890000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Fuganda-safari%2F7-days-natures-wonder-safari%2F|title:7%20Days%20Nature’s%20Wonder%20Safari”][vc_column_text]
Experience the wonders of Uganda on unforgettable Uganda safari tours. Starting in Kampala, you’ll be greeted at the airport and taken to your hotel near Lake Victoria. Journey to Queen Elizabeth National Park, where thrilling game drives and breathtaking boat rides await, offering encounters with diverse wildlife and stunning landscapes. Continue to Bwindi Impenetrable National Park for a once-in-a-lifetime gorilla trekking adventure, surrounded by the beauty of the forest. Conclude your Uganda safari with a city tour in Kigali, exploring the poignant history of the genocide memorial site. Book your Uganda safari and tours now for an immersive and captivating African experience.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Package” style=”custom” custom_background=”#890000″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-angle-double-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Fuganda-safari%2F7-days-natures-wonder-safari-2%2F|title:7%20Days%20Nature’s%20Wonder%20Safari” css=”.vc_custom_1741355915768{background-color: #890000 !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner rtl_reverse=”yes”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Secrets Of the Jungle” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23890000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Fuganda-safari%2F8-days-secrets-of-the-jungle%2F|title:8%20Days%20Secrets%20Of%20The%20Jungle”][vc_column_text]
Experience the wonders of Uganda on unforgettable Uganda safari tours. Starting in Kampala, you’ll be greeted at the airport and taken to your hotel near Lake Victoria. Journey to Queen Elizabeth National Park, where thrilling game drives and breathtaking boat rides await, offering encounters with diverse wildlife and stunning landscapes. Continue to Bwindi Impenetrable National Park for a once-in-a-lifetime gorilla trekking adventure, surrounded by the beauty of the forest. Conclude your Uganda safari with a city tour in Kigali, exploring the poignant history of the genocide memorial site. Book your Uganda safari and tours now for an immersive and captivating African experience.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Package” style=”custom” custom_background=”#890000″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-angle-double-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Fuganda-safari%2F8-days-secrets-of-the-jungle%2F|title:8%20Days%20Secrets%20Of%20The%20Jungle” css=”.vc_custom_1741355281821{background-color: #890000 !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”30235″ img_size=”600×300″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator][vc_headings style=”theme3″ linewidth=”100″ borderwidth=”3″ borderclr=”#890000″ title=”Rwanda Safari Tours, Safari Holidays, and Tour Packages” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” titleclr=”#890000″][/vc_headings][vc_column_text]

Embark on the adventure of a lifetime with Rwanda Safari Tours! Discover the breathtaking landscapes and wildlife that make Rwanda a top safari destination. Gorilla Trekking in Rwanda is a must-do activity, where you can get up close and personal with these majestic creatures in their natural habitat. It’s an experience you’ll always remember!

The best time to visit Rwanda for safaris is during the dry season from June to September or December to February when the weather is pleasant and wildlife is more visible. With a range of Rwanda tour packages available, you can choose the perfect itinerary for your dream vacation. From luxury to budget-friendly options, there’s something for everyone. Accommodation while on a Rwanda gorilla tour is top-notch, with lodges and camps that offer comfort and stunning views of the surrounding landscapes.

Planning a Rwanda Safari is easy with reputable tour operators who will handle all the logistics. Take advantage of the Rwanda safari highlights, including gorilla trekking in Volcanoes National park, wildlife viewing in Akagera National Park, and cultural experiences in Nyungwe Forest National Park. Book your Rwanda holiday packages today and get ready for an unforgettable adventure!

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

With various accommodation options available, from luxury lodges to comfortable tented camps, your Uganda safari holiday can be tailored to suit your preferences and budget. Our expert guides and tour operators will ensure your safety, comfort, and unforgettable experiences throughout your journey.

Uganda safari holidays offer a unique blend of adventure, wildlife, culture, and natural beauty. It’s a destination that will awaken your senses and leave you with memories that will last a lifetime. Whether you’re an avid wildlife enthusiast, a photography enthusiast, or simply seeking an extraordinary escape, Uganda safari holidays will surely deliver an experience like no other. Get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey and discover the magic of Uganda.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1683960304358{margin-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_headings style=”theme3″ linewidth=”100″ borderwidth=”3″ borderclr=”#890000″ title=”RWANDA SAFARI PACKAGES” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” titleclr=”#890000″][/vc_headings][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Rwanda Gorilla Trekking” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23890000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Frwanda-safari%2F3-day-gorilla-trek%2F|title:3%20Day%20Gorilla%20Trek”][vc_column_text]

Embark on an unforgettable 3-day journey into the heart of Rwanda’s Volcanoes National Park, a mist-shrouded realm of emerald forests and the last refuge of the mountain gorilla. Your adventure begins with a warm welcome amidst breathtaking scenery, setting the stage for an extraordinary trek into the park’s depths. Guided by experts, you’ll traverse the vibrant forest, where the air hums with wildlife, culminating in a face-to-face encounter with a gorilla family.

This extraordinary experience allows you to witness the gentle power of silverbacks and the playful energy of gorilla young, forging a profound connection with these magnificent animals. Beyond the gorilla encounter, the safari provides opportunities to explore the park’s diverse ecosystem, with options to observe golden monkeys or immerse yourself in the local culture through village visits.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Package” style=”custom” custom_background=”#890000″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-angle-double-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Frwanda-safari%2F3-day-gorilla-trek%2F|title:3%20Day%20Gorilla%20Trek” css=”.vc_custom_1741357186629{background-color: #890000 !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”7471″ img_size=”600×350″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”11712″ img_size=”600×350″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Rwanda Primate Paradise” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23890000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Frwanda-safari%2Frwanda-classic-primate-trek%2F|title:Rwanda%20Classic%20Primate%20Trek”][vc_column_text]

Your Rwandan journey begins in the heart of breathtaking scenery, leading you into Volcanoes National Park. Guided by expert trackers, you’ll trek through the dense vegetation, building anticipation for the moment you encounter a gorilla family. Witness their natural interactions, the maternal care, and the playful energy of the young – an awe-inspiring hour that will leave a lasting impression.

Beyond the gorilla encounter, this safari offers the chance to explore the park’s diverse ecosystem. You might spot golden monkeys or hike to scenic viewpoints, immersing yourself in the beauty and tranquility of this unique and captivating corner of the world.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Package” style=”custom” custom_background=”#890000″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-angle-double-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Frwanda-safari%2Frwanda-classic-primate-trek%2F|title:Rwanda%20Classic%20Primate%20Trek” css=”.vc_custom_1741357208174{background-color: #890000 !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Rwanda Primate Odyssey & Lake Kivu” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23890000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Frwanda-safari%2Frwanda-primates-encounter-lake-kivu%2F|title:Rwanda%20Primates%20Encounter%20%26%20Lake%20Kivu”][vc_column_text]

Embark on a thrilling 5-day adventure in Rwanda, starting with a trek through Volcanoes National Park for an unforgettable encounter with mountain gorillas. Witness these gentle giants in their natural habitat, an experience that will leave a lasting impact. Explore the park’s stunning volcanic landscapes, hike to breathtaking viewpoints, and immerse yourself in the beauty and tranquility of the rainforest.

Conclude your journey with relaxation and serenity on the shores of Lake Kivu. Unwind on sandy beaches, soak up the sun, and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere. Take a boat trip, swim in the clear waters, or simply savor the stunning scenery. This brief but powerful safari offers a perfect blend of thrilling wildlife encounters and serene natural beauty, creating memories to cherish forever

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”View Package” style=”custom” custom_background=”#890000″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-angle-double-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fmufasatoursandtravels.com%2Frwanda-safari%2Frwanda-primates-encounter-lake-kivu%2F|title:Rwanda%20Primates%20Encounter%20%26%20Lake%20Kivu” css=”.vc_custom_1741357234459{background-color: #890000 !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”7481″ img_size=”600×350″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Uganda & Rwanda Safaris FAQs” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:26|text_align:center|color:%23890000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1741356739004{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_toggle title=”What is the best time to go on a Uganda safari?” style=”square”]
The best time to go on a Uganda safari is during the dry seasons, generally from December to February and June to September. These months offer pleasant weather conditions and easier access to national parks for wildlife sightings and activities such as gorilla trekking.
[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Do I need to book my Uganda safari in advance?” style=”square”]
Booking your Uganda safari in advance is highly recommended, especially for activities like gorilla trekking that require permits with limited availability. Planning ahead lets you secure the necessary permits, accommodations, and preferred tour operators to ensure a seamless and enjoyable safari experience.
[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What wildlife can I expect to see on a Uganda safari?” style=”square”]
Uganda is known for its diverse wildlife. On a Uganda safari, you can expect to see mountain gorillas, chimpanzees, elephants, lions, buffalos, giraffes, zebras, various antelope species, and a wide range of bird species. The specific wildlife sightings may vary depending on the national park or reserve you visit.
[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Are there age restrictions for gorilla trekking in Uganda?” style=”square”]
Are there age restrictions for gorilla trekking in Uganda?
Yes, there are age restrictions for gorilla trekking in Uganda. The minimum age requirement is 15 years old to participate in the activity. This is to ensure the safety and well-being of visitors and the gorillas.
[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”How physically demanding is gorilla trekking in Uganda?” style=”square”]
Gorilla trekking in Uganda can be physically demanding, as it involves hiking through dense forests and steep terrain. The duration and difficulty of the trek can vary, ranging from 1 to 6 hours. It’s important to be reasonably fit and prepared for moderate physical exertion, although the experience is accessible to most individuals with a basic fitness level.
[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Can I combine a Uganda safari Tours with other East African countries?” style=”square”]
Yes, it is possible to combine a Uganda safari with visits to other East African countries like Kenya, Tanzania, and Rwanda, or even extend your trip to explore the stunning landscapes of the Serengeti, Masai Mara, or the iconic Ngorongoro Crater.
[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row]

serpData.title: Uganda Safari Tours, Safari Holidays and Tour Packages
serpData.description: Explore Uganda Safari  Tours: Discover the Top Safari Holidays, Tour Packages, Adventure Tours, and Travel Itineraries, and Enjoy Gorilla Trekking in Uganda.
serpData.focusKeywords: uganda safari,uganda safaris,Uganda tours,Uganda safari tours,uganda tour,uganda safari holidays,uganda tour packages,gorilla trekking uganda
